item.title: Example Post
item.description: R Markdown This is a post created with R Markdown. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. Raw code is availible here. Includng R code and results fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = dist ~ speed, data = cars) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) speed ## -17.579 3.932 Including images MI2 Logo Including Plots You can also embed plots.
